about_the_game: Producing 290hp, the Porsche 911 SC RS was and still is one of the most recognisable racing cars in the world. Modified for rally, this car featured tougher suspension, a wider body and event specific add-ons. This car was capable of taking the fight to its AWD rivals on a regular basis.
detailed_description: Producing 290hp, the Porsche 911 SC RS was and still is one of the most recognisable racing cars in the world. Modified for rally, this car featured tougher suspension, a wider body and event specific add-ons. This car was capable of taking the fight to its AWD rivals on a regular basis.
